thread.section_title: MCM Electronics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MCM Electronics | www.mcmelectronics.com
thread.title: Fred Mullins
thread.title_full: MCM Electronics reviewed by Fred Mullins

author: Fred Mullins
title: Fred Mullins
text: In my loudspeaker building years I bought many items from MCM and was never disappointed. After an absence of many years I returned to loudspeaker construction as a hobby with my late in life son (he's 19, I'm 63). Bought a 12" bass driver to build a bass amp speaker. Good stuff at a fair price, prompt delivery and exactly as described. Nothing more need be said.
